titles.title: Congratulating the Texas A&M University Aggies for winning the men's and women's NCAA Division I Outdoor Track and Field Championship.

bill.summary: Congratulates the Texas A&M University track team for winning the 2010 NCAA Division I Outdoor Track and Field Championship.
